<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Mission Information </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Loads game from the last autosave made with [[saveGame]]. If no autosave exists, restarts the mission. When used in campaign it will also deduct 1 life, defined in:<br>
<tt>[[campaignConfigFile]] / "Campaign" / &lt;battle&gt; / &lt;mission&gt; / "lives"</tt><br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> A [[addMissionEventHandler | mission event handler]] [[Arma_3:_Event_Handlers/addMissionEventHandler#Loaded | <tt>"Loaded"</tt>]] is available and is important that it is added in <tt>preInit</tt> in order for it to fire on load from save</value></part></template>  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''loadGame''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[loadGame]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[enableSaving]], [[saveGame]], [[savingEnabled]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
